alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:58AM CDT until July 21 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BENTON AND NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 758 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gentry to 4 miles south of Springtown to 2 miles northeast of Cincinnati, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Siloam Springs... Gentry... Decatur... Highfill... Springtown... Cincinnati... Lake Francis... Fairmount... Wedington... Gallitin... Rhea... Rocky Comfort... Cherokee City... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
